eventHandlers.code:
const checked = event.target.checked;
setTodoChecked({ id, checked });

const text = event.target.value;
setTodoText({ id, text });

reducers.code:
const { id, checked } = payload;
state.byId[id].checked = checked;

const { id, text } = payload;
state.byId[id].text = text;
